meanings.definition: To persist in an activity or process.
meanings.sent1: I will continue to play outside.
meanings.sent2: She will continue reading her book.
meanings.sent3: The little boy decided to continue jumping in puddles.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to continue learning shone brightly.
meanings.sent5: The marathon runner will continue running until the finish line.

meanings.sent1: After the phone call, she will continue her work.
meanings.sent2: Let's continue the game after the break.
meanings.sent3: The movie paused for a moment, then decided to continue.
meanings.sent4: The music continued playing after the brief silence.
meanings.sent5: The story will continue from where it left off.

meanings.definition: To remain in existence or effect.
meanings.sent1: The old tradition will continue for generations.
meanings.sent2: The law will continue to be enforced.
meanings.sent3: The magic spell made the rain continue for days.
meanings.sent4: The impact of his words continued to resonate in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the painting will continue to captivate viewers.
